abbreviation.description: The abbreviation used by astronomers for the item

api_support.description: Defines the three levels of POLOS API support

automation_label.description: The automation level is used to synchronise POLIS data sets with external systems (e.g. ASCOM

external_references.description: External references connecting the item with external source of data, e.g. RTML or VO IDs, or URLs to describing documentation

facebook_ids.description: Array of valid facebook IDs as strings. The IDs represent only the part after the www.facebook.com base URL.

id.description: Unique ID in the formal of a standard UUID

Instagram_ids.description: Array of valid instagram IDs as strings

last_update.description: Date and time of the last change of the item in an ISO format, e.g. 2023-07-11T01:17:32Z represented as a string

lifecycle_status.description: Defines the readiness of an item to be actively used.

mirror_id.description: Unique ID in the formal of a standard UUID, similar to id

name.description: The name of the item. Recommended to be (semi) unique, but this is not required

note.description: Free text string, that could be formatted with new lines, tabs. etc. and has no size limit. Nevertheless. Too long notes should be avoided.

observing_type.description: Defines the type of the POLIS Service Provider.

provider_type.description: Defines the type of the POLIS Service Provider.

rough_direction.description: Rough direction represented as a string.

reachability_status.description: Defines how reachable is the POLIS Service Provider.

skype_ids.description: Array of valid skype IDs as strings

twitter_ids.description: Array of valid twitter IDs as strings

unit.description: The unit of a PolisPropertyValue as a string.

url.description: Well formated URL including the protocol, e.g. https://polis.net .

value.description: The value of a PolisPropertyValue as a string.

value_kind.description: Defines the value type of the property, e.g. Int, Double, ...

version.description: Semantic Version of the POLIS implementation (see: SemanticVersioning: https: //semver.org)

whatsapp_ids.description: Array of valid WhatsApp IDs as strings
